name: I Wanna How Many Bottles Of Coke Zero Can Badlands Chug In 3 Minutes? Watch & See!
name_original: I Wanna How Many Bottles Of Coke Zero Can Badlands Chug In 3 Minutes? Watch & See!
description:
A silly joke game that was supposed to be part of a much larger project, that Renko, Natsu and renex developed together in a couple of group calls.

Watch BadlandsChugs, he's an awesome dude.

We hope you get a kick out of it!
